127.name: Salvage Master
127.description: More interested in what's inside...or just in seeing it fall apart.

319.name: Stay Out!
319.description: When you say you'll defend something, you really mean it!

340.name: Shattered
340.requirement: Break 5 people out of crystal prisons created by the Shatterer.

403.name: PvP Daily Player Kills
403.requirement: Kill, or help kill, an enemy player in a PvP match.

553.name: Bachelor of Secrets, World 1
553.requirement: Find all of the hidden rooms (excluding furniture shops) in World 1, Zone 2.

bits.text: Next to a shop.
Near rushing water.
Low, underneath the trees.
Past the big hollow log.
Ground level, before a checkpoint.
This water tastes improper.

572.name: A Rallying Flame
572.requirement: Commemorate the completion of the Flame and Frost story by celebrating with your new allies in Hoelbrak.

718.name: Learn to Kite
718.requirement: Find all seven of the large kites hidden across Tyria and the Mists.

742.name: I Like Evon
742.requirement: Contribute one support token for Evon Gnashblade on board the Zephyr Sanctum.

762.name: Speedy Sprinter
762.description: Place among the top three racers in Sanctum Sprint.
762.requirement: Place in the top three  times.

805.name: Risk Taker
805.requirement: Win  third tier matches with an active gambit.

816.name: Soft Lander
816.requirement: Survive jumping from the upper arena ring into a hay pile.

842.name: Daily Invasion Responder
842.requirement: Stop one of Scarlet's portal invasions.

907.name: Watch Your Step!
907.requirement: Don't get caught in any bloated creeper explosions.

919.name: What Does She Know?
919.requirement: Quickly gain access to Scarlet's secret room.

950.name: Deep Down or Airships Grounded
950.requirement: Complete either a Sorrow's Embrace or Twilight Arbor dungeon (story or explorable).

1075.name: Toxic Gardener
1075.description: Aid in the destruction of toxic offshoots.

1130.name: Tower Antitoxin Injector
1130.requirement: Inject  dose of antitoxin to into the heart of the tower.

1192.name: Shockwave Skipper
1192.description: They can't hurt what they can't hit.
1192.requirement: Defeated the leaders of the Molten Alliance without being hit by a shockwave.

1193.name: Weapons Tester
1193.requirement: Destroy the thermal core without being struck by any molten weapon attacks.

1200.name: Aftermath Viathan Cleaner
1200.requirement: Complete  event in and around Viathan Lake in Kessex Hills.

1274.name: That Wintersday Ring III
1274.requirement: Take part in the Wintersday Bell Choir.

1275.name: Making Some Wintersday Friends III
1275.description: Wintersday always brings out the crowds.
1275.requirement: Build five snowmen using magic snow dispensers hidden throughout Tyria.

1283.name: Spreading Wintersday Joy IV
1283.description: Make the lives of the less fortunate in Divinity's Reach a little better.
1283.requirement: Make a donation to Ho-Ho-Tron in Divinity's Reach.

1332.name: Wurm Phytotoxin Collector
1332.requirement: Collect each of the  colored phytotoxins around the crimson great jungle wurm.

1346.name: Raiders of the Lost Parts
1346.requirement: Find and retrieve Taimi's golem parts from the Edge of the Mists.

1415.name: Hold the Line
1415.requirement: Participate in Rally Point Defense events in Lion's Arch.

1577.name: Pirate Purger
1577.requirement: Kill  pirate in the Crown Pavilion.

1633.name: Dive Master: Prospect Valley
1633.requirement: Find and use a diving location in Prospect Valley.

1702.name: Mischief Maker
1702.requirement: Urge Taimi to yell at Braham during the recalibration device demonstration.

1712.name: Fractal Master
1712.description: <c=@flavor>WARNING: some fractals may cause injury, psychic trauma, blindness, or death.</c>
1712.requirement: Unlock all  fractal weapon skins in your wardrobe.

1728.name: Fine Wining
1728.locked_text: Purchase a Vintner's Guide from Gastronome Plikk in Rata Sum.

1735.name: Tormented Weapon Collection
1735.description: <c=@flavor>The jealous are troublesome to others, but certainly a torment to themselves.</c>
1735.requirement: Unlock all  Tormented weapon skins in your wardrobe.

1752.name: Spirit Crafter
1752.description: <c=@flavor>May the spirits of the past protect me now and forever.</c>
1752.requirement: Unlock  spirit weapons in your wardrobe.

1812.name: Defender: Amber Sandfall
1812.requirement: Successfully defend Amber Sandfall from the Mordrem after the Pact forces holding the fort have achieved level 3 defenses.

1814.name: Luminescent Gloves
1814.requirement: Collect the  parts required to assemble Luminescent Gloves.

1927.name: Daily Pig Iron Quarry Jumping Puzzle
1927.requirement: Complete the Pig Iron Quarry jumping puzzle in Fireheart Rise.

1937.name: Daily Maguuma Wastes Vista Viewer
1937.description: Always on the lookout for a good view.
1937.requirement: View a vista in one of the following Maguuma Wastes maps: Dry Top and the Silverwastes.

2026.name: Daily Claw of Jormag
2026.requirement: Defeat the Claw of Jormag on the Frostwalk Tundra in Frostgorge Sound.

2104.name: Daily Elementalist or Mesmer Winner
2104.requirement: Win  PvP match as an elementalist or mesmer.

2164.name: Auric Basin Insight: Southwatch Creep
2164.requirement: Discover Insights of Maguuma Mastery in Auric Basin.

2392.name: Sign Cutting
2392.requirement: Follow the trail that was laid out for you.

2404.name: Machined Dagger
2404.requirement: Collect all  items to forge your Machined Dagger.

bits.text: Purchased from Itzel vendors for airship parts.
Purchased from Exalted vendors for aurillium.
Purchased from Nuhoch vendors for ley-line crystals.
Charge an oiled weapon component at a place of power in the Heart of Maguuma.
Found in Noxious Pods in Dragon's Stand.

2533.name: Daily Recommended Fractal—Scale 31
2533.requirement:
Complete the fractal dungeon at this difficulty in the Fractals of the Mists through the portal in Lion's Arch.
Requires the mastery Follows Advice.

2545.name: Machined Focus
2545.requirement: Collect all  items to forge your Machined Focus.

bits.text: Purchased from Itzel vendors for airship parts.
Purchased from Exalted vendors for aurillium.
Purchased from Nuhoch vendors for ley-line crystals.
Charge an oiled weapon component at a place of power in the Heart of Maguuma.
Found in Noxious Pods in Dragon's Stand.

2565.name: "Endurance" Strongbox
2565.requirement: Search in the Griffonfall area for the strongbox from the "Endurance."

2570.name: The Most Dangerous Game
2570.requirement: Reach and complete the final stage of an Itzel hunting excursion.

2574.name: Treetop Retriever
2574.requirement: Locate the 10 lost Priory corpses in the Tarnished Treetop of Auric Basin.

bits.text: A female asura researcher was last seen north of Wanderer's Waypoint.
Since he went to an upper ledge to examine the Exalted portal, the asura researcher hasn't been heard from.
Someone overheard the Zintl boasting about finding the remains of a female charr explorer.
Echoes of a male charr explorer fighting a large colony of vampire beasts filled the canopy the other night.
A human explorer bailed from the airship too early. She was lost near Capitzel Grounds.
Heading east, the explorer was cornered by a jaguar. The human never made it down from the canopy.
An injured norn historian held off the bonebreaker so others could escape. Her sacrifice won't be forgotten.
A lower ledge broke his fall, but then the norn explorer was surrounded by Tengu scouts.
A sylvari historian got trapped along the northern cliffside of Tarnished Treetop. She had little chance to survive.
An explorer tried to find his way south and down from the canopy. The sylvari only found a Coztic ambush.
Greed will be your undoing.
You'll miss it the first time.
The prize before the fight.
If you can't stand the heat...

2655.name: RGB
2655.requirement: Obtain each pylon attunement once, and defeat the Vale Guardian.

bits.text: Red Attunement
Green Attunement
Blue Attunement

2698.name: League Top Stats—Recruit
2698.description: Completing this achievement advances the meta-achievement Path of the Ascension I: The Thrill of Battle.
2698.requirement: Earn 25 top stats in ranked matches.

2779.name: Silver for the Season
2779.requirement: Donate silver to Ho-Ho-Tron in Divinity's Reach.

2809.name: Dragon's Gaze
2809.requirement: Interrupt  skill in the Dragon Ball arena.

2921.name: Chuka and Champawat II: Ambush
2921.description: Your first attempt to craft the legendary precursor Tigris has been modestly successful, but it has not yet yielded the weapon you ultimately desire. This journey has only just begun. Find a teacher, research your procedures, and hone your skills before you try a second time.

bits.text: Speak to a Master Huntsman to learn his needs for the war effort.
Speak to a Master Huntsman to discover the art of woodworking.
Speak to a Master Huntsman to learn his needs for the war effort.
Speak to a Master Huntsman to discover the secret to balancing a stave.
Speak to a Master Huntsman to discover the art of tanning.
Speak to a Master Huntsman to learn his needs for the war effort.
Speak to a Master Huntsman to discover the secret to reinforcing strings.
Speak to a Master Huntsman to learn the secrets of superior woodworking tools.
Speak to Scholar Mossi in the Trader's Forum in Lion's Arch to learn her needs for applied research in Desert Magics.
Speak to Scholar Mossi in the Trader's Forum in Lion's Arch to learn her needs for applied research in Jungle Magics.
Speak to Scholar Mossi in the Trader's Forum in Lion's Arch to learn her needs for applied research in Old World Magics.
Speak to Scholar Mossi in the Trader's Forum in Lion's Arch to learn her needs for applied research in Ancient Water Magics.
Speak to Scholar Mossi in the Trader's Forum in Lion's Arch to learn her needs for applied research in Stabilizing Magics.
Purchased from Scholar Mossi after training the Magister of Legends ability in the Legendary Crafting Mastery Track.
Purchased from Grandmaster Craftsman Hobbs after training the Magister of Legends ability in the Legendary Crafting Mastery Track.

2928.name: Daily Tier 3 Aetherblade
2928.requirement: Complete Aetherblade at fractal scale 51 or higher.

3009.name: Thwart the Inquest
3009.requirement: Don't allow the Inquest to collect any accumulated ley-line magic.

3024.name: Siege the Stronghold
3024.requirement: Assault the Stronghold of the Faithful and gain access to the courtyard.

3029.name: Anomalies of the World
3029.requirement: Disperse Ley-Line Anomalies in all of the areas they appear.

bits.text: Gendarran Fields
Iron Marches
Timberline Falls

3066.name: Don't Cross the Streams
3066.description: Every molecule in your body exploded at the speed of light.
3066.requirement: Use ley-line magic in the middle of a ley line.

3085.name: Surf and Turf
3085.description: Sea or Shore? Who will prevail?
3085.requirement: Earn your sea legs by completing these achievements.

3147.name: Walking on Fire
3147.requirement: Navigate the lava tunnel in Ember Bay.

3150.name: Skrilla's Benefactor
3150.description: Fastest way to a skritt's heart.
3150.requirement: Give Skrilla enough coin to make her happy!

3174.name: Bitterfrost Frontier Insight: The Bitter Cold
3174.requirement: Discover this Maguuma Mastery Insight in Bitterfrost Frontier.

3191.name: Delicious Desserts
3191.requirement: Give a little quaggan sweets to annoy its parents.

3215.name: Daily Recommended Fractal—Scale 64
3215.requirement:
Complete the fractal dungeon at this difficulty in the Fractals of the Mists through the portal in Lion's Arch.
Requires the mastery Follows Advice.

3219.name: Daily Recommended Fractal—Scale 69
3219.requirement:
Complete the fractal dungeon at this difficulty in the Fractals of the Mists through the portal in Lion's Arch.
Requires the mastery Follows Advice.

3273.name: Light Up the Sky
3273.requirement: Set off  Lunar New Year fireworks.

3312.name: Commanding Officer
3312.description: The best commanders have the loyalty of their troops.
3312.requirement: Summon  archer or door breaker during Battle of Champion's Dusk rated matches.

3373.name: Spirit Watch Killer
3373.requirement: Defeat  player during Spirit Watch rated matches.

3374.name: The Whispers Way
3374.description:
Story Instance: Confessor's End

"For those who prefer to do it real quiet-like."
3374.requirement: Instead of killing them, avoid both jade construct sentries.

3406.name: Born for Battle
3406.requirement: Defeat ten mercenaries during the final surge.

3439.name: White Hat
3439.description: "I'll create a BLUI interface using virtual cones—see if I can track the device." —Taimi

3473.name: Abaddon's Ascent
3473.requirement: Reach the top of the tower.

3475.name: Siren's Landing Insight: Lava Leap
3475.requirement: Discover this Mastery Insight in Siren's Landing.

3479.name: Daily Siren's Landing: Kingpin Killer
3479.requirement: Take down the Event Kingpins around Siren's Landing.

3489.name: Aurora II: Empowering
3489.requirement: Collect all  items to create a Spark of Sentience.

bits.text: Infuse a Xunlai electrum ingot at the Hidden Ourobon in Harathi Hinterlands.
Infuse a Xunlai electrum ingot at Bloody Bill's Base in Bloodtide Coast
Infuse a Xunlai electrum ingot at Copperhammer Mines in Timberline Falls.

Infuse a Xunlai electrum ingot at the Sunken Halls of Clarent in Iron Marches.
Infuse a Xunlai electrum ingot at the Volcanic Rim in Mount Maelstrom.
Infuse a Xunlai electrum ingot at the Shattercleft Hills in Sparkfly Fen.
Infuse a Xunlai electrum ingot at the Scavenger's Chasm in Malchor's Leap.
Infuse a Xunlai electrum ingot at the Corpse Grove in Verdant Brink.
Infuse a Xunlai electrum ingot at the Holdfast Hollow in Verdant Brink.

Infuse a Xunlai electrum ingot at the Burnisher Quarry in Auric Basin.

Infuse a Xunlai electrum ingot at the Lava Leap in Siren's Landing.

3491.name: Lake Doric Master
3491.requirement: Collect all  items to prove your mastery over Lake Doric.
3491.locked_text: Acquire a Sentient Seed by combining the four sentient creations from Season 3. Misplaced items can be obtained from Grandmaster Craftsman Hobbs in Lion's Arch.

bits.text: Gathered from jade fragments in Lake Doric.
Aid the frontline defense of Doric's Landing in Lake Doric.
Disrupt White Mantle forces occupying Fort Evennia in Lake Doric.
Help Noran around the Harvest Cascades in Lake Doric.
Help Cin Fursarai around the Lakeside Bazaar in Lake Doric.
Restore normalcy in New Loamhurst in Lake Doric.
Help restore life to Saidra's Haven in Lake Doric.
Dropped by bloodstone-crazed centaurs.
Obtained after defeating Siegemaster Immelhoof in Lake Doric.
Obtained from Noran's Safe Room in Lake Doric.
Dropped by White Mantle defending jade cannons in Lake Doric.
Dropped by White Mantle enemies in Lake Doric.
Found near the graves of the Ebon Vanguard soldiers.

3505.name: Live Wire
3505.requirement: Suffer the shocking fate of curiosity.

3670.name: A Soaring Stench
3670.description: A fine ride with a not-so-fine smell.
3670.requirement: Soar through Caustic Spur to reach the overlook cache.

3674.name: Adept Renegade
3674.requirement: Begin training the revenant's renegade elite specialization.

3681.name: Blood and Sand
3681.description: Rumors in Elon Riverlands speak of a terrifying sand shark that's attracted to the scent of blood in the dunes.
3681.requirement: Kill the monstrous sand shark, Mazomba.

3721.name: Daily Desert Vista Viewer
3721.description: Always on the lookout for a good view.
3721.requirement: View a vista in one of the following locations: Crystal Oasis, the Desert Highlands, Elon Riverlands, the Desolation, or the Domain of Vabbi.

3745.name: Warpblade
3745.requirement: Collect these  items and skins to receive the weaver's sword, Warpblade.
3745.locked_text: Begin training the elementalist's weaver elite specialization.

bits.text: Begin training the elementalist's weaver elite specialization.
Drops from hydras in the Crystal Desert.
Purchased from Distinguished Professor Nazimi at the Vehtendi Academy in the Domain of Vabbi.
As an elementalist, use a Mystic Coin in the wishing well in the Garden of Seborhin in the Domain of Vabbi.
Complete the bounty for Aszar, Swinging Pendulum in the Lair of the Forgotten, in the Desolation.
Purchased from Keeper Pamir at Torment's Watch in the Desolation.
Complete a race event as an elementalist in any Crystal Desert map.
Found when identifying gear, or purchased from the Black Lion Trading Post.
Defeat the water djinn Shazuul below Vehtendi Academy in the Domain of Vabbi.
Explore Transcendent Bay in the Desert Highlands with your jackal.
Drops for elementalists from caffeinated skritt in any Crystal Desert map.
Completely train the elementalist's weaver elite specialization.
Earn map complete on any Crystal Desert map as an elementalist.
Craft with recipes purchased in the Desolation or the Domain of Vabbi.

3797.name: Master of Mummies
3797.requirement: Close the portal without ever switching to your personal skills.

3841.name: Domain of Vabbi Insight: Zagonur Towers
3841.requirement: Discover this Crystal Desert Mastery Insight in the Domain of Vabbi.

3851.name: Jilai the Radiant
3851.requirement: Defeat the earth djinn Jilai the Radiant.

3996.name: The First City
3996.requirement: Travel to the First City in pursuit of your friend.

4005.name: Daily Domain of Istan Racer
4005.requirement: Complete a race within the Domain of Istan.

4040.name: Champion's Dawn
4040.requirement: Travel to Champion's Dawn in pursuit of Zaeim.

4052.name: (Annual) Snow Drifter
4052.requirement: Complete the race event in Divinity's Reach during Wintersday in under 3 minutes. Achievement can be completed once per year.

4076.name: Friends in High Places
4076.description: You've always got a friend at ArenaNet.
4076.requirement: Enter Lion's Arch in the month of February.

4167.name: Survey on Subjects of Importance
4167.requirement: Take a poll from a traveling journalist krewe.

4171.name: Master Diver: Kessex Hills
4171.description: This chest can be reopened once per week or per completion of the Master Diver achievement.
4171.requirement: Find and open the sunken chest in Kessex Hills.

4192.name: Roller Beetle Training: Silver
4192.requirement: Earn this achievement by opening the silver chest.

4193.name: For Petey's Sake
4193.description: Find the collections requested by Gorrik to nurse Petey back to health.

bits.text: Complete the Beetle Juice collection.
Complete the Bulletproof Beetle collection.
Complete the Performance Enhancement collection.
Speak to Gorrik once the above collections have been completed.

4202.name: Beetlemania
4202.description: Collection: Help Gorrik make a new friend.
4202.requirement: Collect the items Gorrik asked for to complete Petey's guided evolution.

4319.name: Blitz Breaker
4319.requirement: Complete a Boss Blitz meta-event in the Crown Pavilion.

4333.name: Day Trader
4333.requirement: Trade with vendors in the Labyrinthine Cliffs for Zephyrite Supply Boxes, and open the boxes.

4384.name: Not Today
4384.description:
Nothing is allowed to have that many legs and stay alive.

Story Instance: Legacy
4384.requirement: Defeat the spider broodmother without being downed or defeated.

4408.name: Words of Mending
4408.locked_text: Speak with Amira in Sun's Refuge.

4440.name: Mad Drifter
4440.requirement: Complete a lap of any race event or time trial in the Mad King's Raceway within the challenge time.

4467.name: Rolling Competitor: Jormag's Fang
4467.requirement: Complete 15 laps of the roller beetle race in Snowden Drifts. (This achievement can be completed in the race event or adventure.)

4542.name: Chasing Tales: Hobbler
4542.description: Mouglon could spot the flaw in any defense.
4542.requirement: Apply 30 conditions with a mace in Thunderhead Peaks.

bits.text: Learned of Mouglon the Watchful.
Applied 30 conditions with a mace in Thunderhead Peaks.

4585.name: Chasing Tales: The Old Ways
4585.description: "Ganging up on an old man, eh?"
4585.requirement: Defeat 30 enemies while wielding a staff in Thunderhead Peaks.

bits.text: Learned of Elegos the Harmless.
Defeated 30 enemies with a staff in Thunderhead Peaks.

4757.name: Visions of Dragonfall
4757.description:
Crashing to the earth, cleaving the Mists...

Note: Completion of this achievement requires completion of the Riding Skyscales achievement.
4757.requirement: Explore the isle of Dragonfall for greater insight.
4757.locked_text: Purchase a Trance Stone from any Volatile Magic vendor to unlock this collection.

4762.name: Vision I: Awakening
4762.description: Breathe deeply and open all three of your eyes.
4762.requirement: Experience the old through new eyes.
4762.locked_text: Purchase a Trance Stone from any Volatile Magic vendor to unlock this achievement.

bits.text: Complete the Visions of Istan collection.
Complete the Visions of Sandswept Isles collection.
Complete the Visions of Kourna collection.
Complete the Visions of Jahai collection.
Complete the Visions of Thunderhead Peaks collection.
Complete the Visions of Dragonfall collection.

4779.name: Quell the Storm
4779.description: Fight hard against the treacherous tempest.
4779.requirement: Defeat Cardinal Sabir while the challenge mote is active.

4864.name: (Annual) Boss Blitz: Beat Boom-Boom
4864.requirement: Defeat Boom-Boom Baines during a Boss Blitz event in the Crown Pavilion. This achievement can be completed once every year.

4948.name: Grothmar Grand Tour: Pole Position
4948.requirement: Finish the Grothmar Grand Tour in the top three.

4979.name: Stay Frosty
4979.requirement: Complete the Shiverpeaks Pass Strike Mission.

4987.name: Bodyguarded
4987.requirement: Escort the Flame Legion shaman to Doomlore Shrine without him getting downed.

5004.name: Royal Flame Weapons
5004.requirement: Unlock all  Royal Flame weapon skins in your wardrobe.

5098.name: Ox's Revelation
5098.requirement: Defeat the Ox's Champion Fallen Pineshade while fighting Drakkar in Bjora Marches.

5113.name: Voice in the Deep
5113.description: Journal: Voice in the Deep Completed

5191.name: Onsite Procurement
5191.requirement: Commandeer and fire stone cannons in the Forging Steel vision.

5200.name: Emergency Maintenance
5200.requirement: Repair the tank with patch kits or scrap.

5252.name: Tengu Weapon Collector
5252.requirement: Unlock all 16 tengu weapon skins in your wardrobe.

5253.name: Special Mission: Clear the Lighthouse
5253.requirement: Defeat  Dominion charr in Lighthouse Point in the Drizzlewood Coast.

5349.name: Special Mission: Declawed
5349.requirement: Defeat the Claw of Jormag  times in the Northern Drizzlewood Coast.

5403.name: Death to the Dominion
5403.requirement:
Collect Charr Commendations for the legions by defeating Dominion forces and accomplishing objectives in the Drizzlewood Coast.
Speak with a quaestor in any allied base to change which legion your commendations go to.

5529.name: Crystal Bloom Global Ranks
5529.requirement: Speak with the Crystal Bloom field leader in Eye of the North once the global support goals have been met.

5606.name: Bright Inquisitor Weapon Collection
5606.requirement: Unlock all  Bright Inquisitor weapon skins in your wardrobe.

5616.name: Shiver Reward Track
5616.requirement: Purchase Shivering Ice from a recruited faction vendor in Eye of the North.

5642.name: Emergency Dragon Responder: Bloodtide Coast
5642.requirement: Complete the Bloodtide Coast Dragon Response Mission.

5682.name: Ooze Herding
5682.description: Safe ooze handling is an important lesson in any curriculum.
5682.requirement: Return an ooze to the ooze farmer in each zone.

bits.text: World 1 Zone 1
World 1 Zone 2
World 1 Zone 3
World 2 Zone 1
World 2 Zone 2
World 2 Zone 3

5743.name: Return to Ember Bay
5743.requirement: Complete  Return to Rising Flames achievements.

5773.name: Return to Dry Top 1
5773.requirement: Complete  Return to Gates of Maguuma and Entanglement achievements.

5790.name: Seasons of the Dragons
5790.requirement: Complete  Return meta-achievements. Return meta-achievements will become available over time, and they are permanently available once introduced.

5917.name: Revenge of Kuda
5917.requirement: Defeat the Inquest's champions in the Specimen Chamber.

5985.name: Return to Forging Steel
5985.requirement: Complete the story mission Forging Steel in Living World Icebrood Saga Visions of the Past: Steel and Fire.

6031.name: The Goldclaw Holiday Collection
6031.requirement: Read hidden books during festival events.

bits.text: Lunar New Year
Super Adventure Festival
Dragon Bash
Festival of the Four Winds
Halloween
Wintersday

6071.name: On the Case
6071.requirement: Delve into the strange goings-on in the mines.

6078.name: Slippery as a Fish
6078.requirement: Complete the Vasburg Armory minidungeon without getting hit by any traps.

6099.name: Turtle Unlock: Suiting Up
6099.requirement: Collect parts to construct a turtle saddle and turrets.
6099.locked_text: Unlocks once your turtle is fully grown.

bits.text: Obtained from the remnants of the Jade Maw in Dragon's End.
Purchased from Elora in New Kaineng City.
Obtained from the Aetherblade Renyak in Seitung Province.
Obtained by helping Doireann gather sap within Echovald Wilds. Derived from alleola sap gathered from the Forever Tree of Echovald Forest.
Ripped from the gullet of a mighty leviathan off the coast of Seitung Province or New Kaineng City.
Purchased from a tengu spy in Echovald Wilds.
Obtained in the Ministry of Security Strike.
Unidentified dye can be purchased from the trading post.

6159.name: An Impostor Walks among Us
6159.description: You'll have to take off your shoes.
6159.requirement: Without being caught or leaving the area, sabotage the Speakers Headquarters, taking the renown heart from completely empty to completely full.

6161.name: Arborstone Hide-and-Seek Master
6161.requirement: Find the hiding tengu fledgling within 60 seconds.

6162.name: Echovald Wilds Mastery
6162.description: Though Echovald may not always grow, it is far from dead.
6162.requirement: Complete achievements within the Echovald Wilds.

6198.name: Misty Leap
6198.requirement: Use diving goggles to jump from the top of the secluded southern waterfall.

6202.name: End of Dragons: Act 4 Mastery
6202.requirement: Complete all  End of Dragons: Act 4 achievements.

6263.name: Avid Krytan Fisher
6263.description: <c=@flavor>The charm of fishing is in pursuing something elusive, though attainable. It is a simple yet profound practice of hope.</c>
6263.requirement: Collect  different fish from the waterways of Kryta.

6295.name: Prima Donna
6295.requirement: Collect these  items and skins to receive the virtuoso's dagger, Prima Donna.
6295.locked_text: Begin training the mesmer's virtuoso elite specialization.

bits.text: Begin training the mesmer's virtuoso elite specialization.
Completely train the mesmer's virtuoso elite specialization.
Combine an Oiled Orichalcum Dagger Blade, 25 Globs of Ectoplasm, Chunks of Jade, and Chunks of Petrified Echovald Resin in the Mystic Forge.
As a mesmer, complete the Dragon's End meta-event.
As a mesmer, complete the Seitung Province meta-event.
As a mesmer, complete the Mai Trin story instance or strike.
As a virtuoso, complete the End of Dragons storyline or the Battle for the Jade Sea meta-event.
Catch a giant gourami in Dragon's End.
Purchased from the crafting research vendor in Seitung Province.
Purchased from the map currency vendor in the Echovald Wilds.
Earned by defeating Purist enemies in Seitung Province.
Earn map completion in the Echovald Wilds as a mesmer.
As a mesmer, defeat a Void Champion at a shipwreck in Dragon's End.
Acquired by harvesting soybeans as a mesmer.

6296.name: Daily End of Dragons Forager
6296.description: Fueling the engines of the economy.
6296.requirement: Gather raw materials by foraging plants in the following locations: Seitung Province, New Kaineng City, Echovald Wilds, or Dragon's End.

6303.name: Dragon's End Culture: The Luxon Armada
6303.requirement: Participate in all events related to the Luxon armada.

bits.text: Drive naga invaders and looters away from Kaolai Tower.
Defeat the summoned creature before it can escape.
Lead newly hatched turtles to the safety of the hatchery ponds.
Defeat the enemies attacking Juno Hatchery.

6312.name: Head's Up!
6312.requirement: Drop three stalactites on the enraged amber elemental.

6478.name: Fishmongers Know Me
6478.description: You can fish your whole life without understanding it was never the fish you were truly after.

6522.name: Dog Nap
6522.requirement: Sit or sleep in the dog park in Lion's Arch for several minutes.

6534.name: The Path of Most Resistance
6534.requirement: Complete the Kaineng Overlook Strike Mission with challenge mode active after triggering Equalization Protocol.

6575.name: Weekly Jade Vault
6575.requirement: Find 4 jade statuettes for Myung-Hee, Keeper of the Jade Vault, and return them to her.

bits.text: Finish the Kaineng Blackout event or purchase from trading post.
Finish the Gang War of Echovald event or purchase from trading post.
Finish the Aetherblade Assault event in Seitung Province or purchase from trading post.
Defeat the final opponent in the Battle for the Jade Sea or purchase from trading post.

6616.name: Defeating the Icebrood
6616.requirement: Defeat  Icebrood enemy in Frostgorge Sound.

6775.name: Trick-or-Treat across Tyria
6775.requirement: Participate in Mad King Says or defeat any champion enemies across Tyria.

6842.name: Black Lion Requisition Mission Week 1
6842.description: The Black Lion Trading Company needs your help!
6842.requirement: Turn in materials with the Black Lion Requisition Officers at any major city during the event window.

6886.name: Tester of Secrets, Under 3
6886.requirement: Find all the green baubles in the World 3 Test Zone.

bits.text: Green Bauble #1
Green Bauble #2
Green Bauble #3
Green Bauble #4
Green Bauble #5
Green Bauble #6
Green Bauble #7
Green Bauble #8

6891.name: Paladin's Decree Weapon Collection
6891.requirement: Unlock all  Paladin's Decree weapon skins in your wardrobe.

6902.name: Gyala Delve Jade Bot Racer: Silver
6902.requirement: Complete the Gyala Delve Jade Bot Racer adventure with a silver rating or better.

6934.name: Peace and Quiet
6934.requirement: Complete Silent Surf on the Master tier with no deaths, no Black Powder Charges used before the final encounter, and no interactions with Captain Thess's portals.

6983.name: Never-Ending Nurture Knowledge
6983.requirement: Successfully complete events in the Bastion of Knowledge.

bits.text: Prepare for the Kryptis assault on the gates.
Aid the Astral Ward in defending or retaking the bastion gates.
Defeat Isgarren's rampaging elemental.
Root out the evidence that some of the library archivists are possesed.
Defeat the Avatar of Gluttony before it abosrbs the knowledge of Amnytas.
Defeat the rampaging museum exhibits.
Find and destroy Isgarren's wards.
Defeat the entity.

7150.name: Skywatch Archipelago Insight: MinSec Server Room
7150.requirement: Discover this Secrets of the Obscure Mastery Insight in Skywatch Archipelago.

7237.name: Elon Riverlands Rift Hunting
7237.requirement: Take down tier 1, tier 2, and tier 3 rift hunt targets in Elon Riverlands.

bits.text: Tier 1 Rift Hunt Target
Tier 2 Rift Hunt Target
Tier 3 Rift Hunt Target

7618.name: Bitterfrost Frontier Incursions
7618.requirement: Repel Kryptis incursions in Bitterfrost Frontier.

7679.name: Dry Top Incursions
7679.requirement: Repel Kryptis incursions in Dry Top.

7706.name: (Weekly) Convergences
7706.description: Hope you enjoy your stay—Kryptis hordes are on the way!

7754.name: Returning to Scarlet's War
7754.requirement: Meet with Captain Ellen Kiel in Lion's Arch to learn about the Return to Season 1 event.

7768.name: Local Response: Battle for Lion's Arch (Weekly)
7768.requirement: Complete events during the battle for Lion's Arch. Participating in the defeat of the Assault Knight Trio during the finale grants extra progress.

7946.name: Emotionless
7946.requirement: Defeat Eparch in the Lonely Tower fractal without allowing him to reach 20 stacks of any emotional attunement.

7983.name: Convergence Challenge Mode—Demon Knight: Gold
7983.requirement: Earn gold-rank timing in a Convergence with challenge mode active for this legendary creature.

7998.name: Reuniting Lost Kryptis: Gold
7998.requirement:
Earn a gold medal in the Reuniting Lost Kryptis adventure.

(Progress will update when you claim the rewards from this adventure.)

8013.name: Devona's Rest Veteran
8013.requirement: Purchase and use a corresponding world title.

8050.name: Convergence Challenge Mode—Umbriel: Gold
8050.requirement: Earn gold-rank timing in a Convergence with challenge mode active for this legendary creature.

8192.name: Very Enthusiastic about Wrestling
8192.description: Let the entire arena know about your passion!

8396.name: Revenge of the Death-Branded Shatterer (Weekly)
8396.requirement: Participate in the Death-Branded Shatterer event.

8399.name: Road of Victory IV
8399.requirement: Earn Proofs of Glory through high placement in monthly tournaments.

8448.name: (Weekly) Convergences: Mount Balrior
8448.description: "Gather 'round for another tale of triumph and struggle..."

8492.name: The Queen of Battle
8492.requirement: Spar with Barbed Vale without being downed.

8546.name: This is my story.
8546.description:
This title can be purchased from Shiny King M'takk in Hooligan's Route in Lion's Arch if you meet the requirements. 

Surely it must be an official title if a self-proclaimed skritt king gives it to you, right?
8546.requirement: Purchase and use a corresponding title.

8597.name: Mistburned Barrens Insight: Alliance Staging Ground Overlook
8597.requirement: Discover this Janthir Wilds Mastery Insight in Mistburned Barrens.

8615.name: Lightbringer
8615.description:
This title can be purchased from Shiny King M'takk in Hooligan's Route in Lion's Arch if you meet the requirements. 

Surely it must be an official title if a self-proclaimed skritt king gives it to you, right?
8615.requirement: Purchase and use a corresponding title.

8636.name: Home Sweet Homestead: Dragon's End
8636.description: Wait. I'm missing a decoration. I sense... Grandfather!
8636.requirement: Complete events in Dragon's End. Group events will award more progress.

bits.text: Complete the achievement Gettin' the Crew Together.
Drops from the event Defeat the Bog Queen before she floods the area with maggots, or can be purchased from the Trading Post or Gharr Leadclaw in Lowland Shore.
Drops from Convergence: Mount Balrior, or can be purchased from the Trading Post.
Drops from Convergence: Mount Balrior, or can be purchased from the Trading Post.
Complete the story step Strangers among Lands.
Drops from Convergence: Mount Balrior, or can be purchased from the Trading Post.
Drops from Convergence: Mount Balrior, or can be purchased from the Trading Post.
Drops from Convergence: Mount Balrior, or can be purchased from the Trading Post.
Drops from Convergence: Mount Balrior, or can be purchased from the Trading Post.
Purchased from Vast Caldera in Coursing Upland in Lowland Shore.
Complete the achievement Autumn's Vale Renown Mastery.
Purchased from Arid Esker in Echoing Hills in Janthir Syntri.
Purchased from Whispers of Wind in Festering Basin in Janthir Syntri.
Complete the achievement Forager's Hunt Renown Mastery.
Purchased from Guiding Breath in Harvest Den in Lowland Shore.
Drops from the Bloodstone Corridor survey lane in Mistburned Barrens, or can be purchased from the renown heart vendor.
Drops from Wraith's Pass survey lane in Mistburned Barrens, or can be purchased from the renown heart vendor.
Complete the achievement Scouring the Archive.
Purchased from the renown heart vendor in Mistburned Barrens.
Drops from the A Titanic Voyage meta-event in Bava Nisos or can be purchased from the Trading Post.
Drops from the A Titanic Voyage meta-event in Bava Nisos or can be purchased from the Trading Post.
Drops from the A Titanic Voyage meta-event in Bava Nisos or can be purchased from the Trading Post.
Drops from the A Titanic Voyage meta-event in Bava Nisos or can be purchased from the Trading Post.
Complete the achievement Titan Terminus by completing Convergence: Mount Balrior with gold timing on all encounters.
Complete the achievement Mastery of Masteries: Janthir Wilds.
Purchased from Ward Trader Sampaguita in Mantle's Arrival in Bava Nisos.

8762.name: Kinfall Fractal
8762.requirement: Complete all the achievements associated with the Kinfall fractal.

8791.name: Revenge of the Kryptis
8791.requirement: During the Unlocking the Wizard's Tower meta-event in Skywatch Archipelago, successfully purge Lyhr's corruption.
